title: Dataset
description: A dataset containing multiple summarized experiments, possibly with non-trivial relationships between the columns of different experiments. This is derived from Bioconductor's [MultiAssayExperiment](https://bioconductor.org/packages/release/bioc/html/MultiAssayExperiment.html) class. This document contains pointers to the various components including the sample data, sample mapping and experiments.

experiments.description: Array of pointers to the summarized experiments. Each experiment should contain column names that unique within that experiment.

sample_data.description: Pointer to the sample data. This should be a data frame with one row per sample in the dataset, where each column contains sample annotations. Row names should be present and unique.

sample_mapping.description:
Pointer to the sample mappings. This defines the relationships between columns of the summarized experiments and the samples in the dataset. The data frame should always contain three string columns:

- `sample`, the sample name.
- 'experiment', the name of the experiment.
- 'column', the name of the column in that experiment.

Each row defines a single relationship between a sample and an experiment's column.

other_data.description: Pointer to additional metadata for this object, typically stored as a list (via the `basic_list` schema).
